title: Ophilia (2014)

director.name: Raja Mukhriz Bin R. Ahmed Kamaruddin

overview: Three skinheads learning about the meaning of life and true friendship.
storyline: Three skinheads learning about the meaning of life and true friendship.
synopsis: Three skinheaded friends; Uji, Ozi Gandum and Totoi come across Ophilia, a negotiator to the biggest triad in Kuala Lumpur. Due to the conflicts between them, Ophilia is accidently killed. Because of this incident, the gangsterism activities in Kuala Lumpur is affected and the three friends are hunted by the triad which requires them to pay a compensation fee of RM75,000.
